IMO has 2 giant security holes: 1. Once a device loges into Imo with a sms 
verification code, no matter how many times you log out, it can be logged 
back in without repeated sms confirmation. They just type your number and 
log in! Use your account on others' device and you can never prevent them ...Full ReviewIMO has 2 giant security holes: 1. Once a device loges into Imo with a sms 
verification code, no matter how many times you log out, it can be logged 
back in without repeated sms confirmation. They just type your number and 
log in! Use your account on others' device and you can never prevent them 
from using your account. 2. Video call can easily be monitored. User A has 
his account logged in on 2 different devices. User B makes a video call to 
User A. Both of User A's devices ring. He answers on first device and video 
call starts. If you take his second device and make a video call to User B, 
you can join the video conference WITHOUT any of the peers knowing! You 
just watch their videos and they won't notice anything! You should never 
use Imo untill they fix those serious issues!
